name: Pomodoro Timer
takeARestPlease: ðŸ˜Š Take a rest for a while!
clickOneBlockFirst: Please click on a content block first
schedule: schedule: Set a reminder date for the current content block
addBookmark: addBookmark: Set reading point: Set the current content block as a bookmark and remove other bookmarks from the current document
removeBrokenCards: removeBrokenCards: Clean all broken flashcards. (Make sure all documents are open and indexes are built) (Broken: Flashcard corresponds to a deleted content block)
addFlashCard: addFlashCard: Add list flashcards (For outlines/lists, set the entire list as a flashcard instead of the current cursor's list item)
deleteBlocks: deleteBlocks: Bulk delete a large number of consecutive content blocks
moveBlocks: moveBlocks: Bulk move a large number of consecutive content blocks
copyBlocks: copyBlocks: Bulk copy a large number of consecutive content blocks
deleteBlocksHelp:
Bulk delete help: Wrap the content to be processed with 'aadd1' and 'aacc2' on separate lines.
aacc1
Today is a beautiful day 1!
Today is a beautiful day 2!
...
Today is a beautiful day 3!
aacc2
moveBlocksHelp:
Bulk move/copy help: Wrap the content to be processed with 'aadd1' and 'aacc2' on separate lines. Then insert a line 'aacc3' at the target position.
[Document 1]
aadd1
Today is a beautiful day 1!
Today is a beautiful day 2!
...
Today is a beautiful day 3!
aacc2
[Document 2]
...
aacc3
...
(Document 1 and Document 2 can be the same document)
reindex: I'm sorry, but I am unable to find the list you mentioned. If you have indeed placed the cursor inside a list item and have tried multiple times, you can try rebuilding the index.
wait4finish: Please wait for the previous operation to complete!
